dialogueTree.text: Nice job inspecting an in video element

badEndDialogueTree.text: On the way to the bad ending, you were a bad man

badEndText.text: On the bad ending, you're in hell

goodEndCongratulations.text: You were a good guy and thus have reached paradise

deermanTransformed.text: This man is now faster and more efficient, a truly invincible agent smith

choseA.text: You chose A during the cutscene, so now you're here in the outcome of choosing A

choseB.text: You chose B during the cutscene, so now you're here in the outcome of choosing B

choseC.text: You chose C during the cutscene, in C the same video continues playing until the end

deerpickup.text: Good job picking up the deer

burnthisman.text: Why would you try to burn this man, are you insane?

RPGTree.text: This man is called Agent Smith! Please be respectful to the man.

RPGTree.label: choices
RPGTree.text: This man is absolutely untouchable, there's nothing you can do to him

choices.text: A) What if I combined deers and used it on him
B) What if I used a deer on this man
C) I got nothing to say

RPGTree.label: combine_deers_q
RPGTree.text: You wouldn't dare... Are you a terrorist?

choices.text: A) Show remorse for your actions
